webpage.title: dental-dams-hp-copy.pdf
webpage.full_text: DENTAL DAMS Works by creating a barrier between the mouth or tongue and the vaginal or anal area during oral sex (“rimming“ or “going down on“ or “eating out“.) When performing oral sex on a penis, use condoms and not dental dams. Check the expiration date, and make sure there are no Open the package with tears/holes clean hands Apply a small amount of water-based lubricant to Place the dental dam flat the vulva/anus before over the entire vaginal or placing the dental dam. anal area and hold it in Don’t used oil-based place while performing products, as they can cause oral sex the dental dam to break Only use one side of the dam – never flip it over! Designed by Emmanuel Ndukwe Ajala and Zanzao Chen, Peer Health Advocates, 2023
